title: Is the crew of the Challenger Space Shuttle still alive?
subtitle: The conspiracy theory claims that the seven astronauts who are supposed to have been killed in the explosion of the 1986 Challenger space shuttle live their lives quietly in the United States.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The seven astronauts who are supposed to have been killed in the 1986 Challenger bombing live their lives quietly in the United States.
